privacy-text:
We respect the privacy of our users and never share our database of e-mail addresses or names with third parties.

PERSONAL INFORMATION WE COLLECT AND HOW IT IS USED

When you place your order, TRADERBOTIC collects your name and e-mail address, which is used to provide you with tracking information.

Like most websites, we also collect information using electronic tools.

We may record the name of your Internet service provider or use cookie technology to recognize you and retain information about your visits to the site. Among other things, the cookie will store your username and password, allowing you to visit the site whenever you wish without having to re-enter your information. As we adopt additional technology, we may introduce another means of collecting data.  

You may choose not to provide us with information, for example, by setting your browser to refuse cookies. However, if you choose to do so, you will be asked to re-enter your username and password each time you visit the site, and you may not access some of its features. Rejecting cookies will also prevent us from customizing the site to suit your browsing habits.  

Personally Identifiable Information (PII) collected by TRADERBOTIC may also be used for other purposes, including site administration, troubleshooting, processing e-commerce transactions, administering sweepstakes and contests, and communicating with users. Certain third parties who provide technical support for the site (our Web hosting service, for example) may also access such information.
